title: Add Web Share API for native sharing
description:
## Goal
Add native share button that opens device share sheet with image + text together.

## Current State
- Copy button copies to clipboard but platforms often strip images
- Users must manually attach images after pasting
- No native mobile sharing experience

## Tasks
- [ ] Add "Share" button using navigator.share() API
- [ ] Include both image (as file) and text in share payload
- [ ] Graceful fallback for browsers without Web Share API support
- [ ] Works great on mobile devices

## Acceptance Criteria
- Share button opens native share sheet on supported devices
- Includes post image and text together
- Falls back to copy behavior on unsupported browsers
- Mobile-first experience

title: Add WebLLM Writing Assistant to intake form
description:
## Goal
Integrate browser-based LLM (WebLLM) into intake form to help users generate "Did You Know?" content with minimal effort.

## Current State
- Users must write content from scratch
- No AI assistance available
- High friction for content creation
- Goal is minimal human-in-the-loop automation

## Tasks
- [ ] Research WebLLM integration (runs locally in browser)
- [ ] Add "AI Generate" button to intake form
- [ ] User enters topic/URL, AI generates Did You Know content
- [ ] AI suggests appropriate hashtags
- [ ] Model downloads on first use, cached thereafter
- [ ] Loading state while model initializes

## Acceptance Criteria
- User enters topic like "Healthcare Pathways"
- AI generates 2-3 sentence "Did You Know?" fact
- AI suggests relevant hashtags
- Works entirely in browser (no API keys needed)
- Progressive enhancement - form works without AI too

## Technical Notes
- Consider WebLLM or Transformers.js
- Small model (Phi-3-mini, Llama-3.2-1B) for fast loading
- System prompt includes MSDE brand guidelines

title: Add WebLLM chatbot to help users navigate the site
description:
## Goal
Add a floating chatbot widget that helps visitors understand the CTE Month toolkit site.

## User Stories
- Visitor asks "How do I share a post?" → Bot explains the process
- Visitor asks "What is CTE Month?" → Bot explains
- Visitor asks "How do I create a new post?" → Bot guides to intake form

## Tasks
- [ ] Create floating chat widget UI (bottom-right corner)
- [ ] Integrate WebLLM with site-specific system prompt
- [ ] Include context about site features, MSDE, CTE Month
- [ ] Handle loading states and fallback gracefully

## Technical
- Uses WebLLM (same as intake form post generator)
- System prompt includes site documentation
- Appears on both index.html and intake.html

title: Add Download Image button to post cards
description:
## Goal
Allow users to download post images with one click instead of right-click > save as.

## Current State
- Posts have Copy, PDF, DOCX, Print buttons
- To get image, users must right-click > Save Image As
- This is friction that reduces sharing

## Tasks
- [ ] Add "Download" or image icon button to action buttons
- [ ] Implement downloadImage(postId) function using canvas/blob
- [ ] Style button consistently with existing buttons

## Acceptance Criteria
- One-click downloads the post image as JPG/PNG
- Works across browsers (Chrome, Firefox, Safari)
- Filename includes post ID for reference
